Text: Why is this only 2.11 GB? I see the others as like 8 to 10? :D

@ Saint.Jimmy.Rotten
its actually Flight Simulator 2004 in which case it is actually bigger than a standard FS2004 upload @ 1.8Mb
in retrospec I would AVOID ANYTHING PACKED IN A .ZIP FILE... especially games, you never know what will pop out when you unzip it...
